message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90, you take 10.  Let's get this over with quickly!
Alice, your offer was a bit unfair.  Let's be reasonable. I take 60, you take 40.
Okay, I'll give you a little more.  70 for me, 30 for you.  Let's end this already!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. It's obvious this will keep going unless we split it evenly. 50/50, take it or leave it.
